messages.message:
Exploratory Chat

Dear Brian, 

Hope all is well. I came across your profile and was very impressed with your background. Your experience at Swiftpage and Charles Schwab as a Senior Software Engineer is very solid.

The team is very interested in getting to know you and your background. I was wondering if you might be open to an informational chat. I would welcome an opportunity to get acquainted and create an opportunity for you to connect with folks here.

I look forward to hearing from you. I am sourcing for Jackie Rickley for these roles to help out- you can contact her directly at 623.505.1258 or jrickley@smci.com

SMCI
